I've added the Namma Metro Network console to the demo page (`src/pages/demo.astro`). It's now listed in the "Live Console" preview section alongside the Mumbai Metro console.

Here are the changes:
- Added a new card for **Namma Metro Network** linking to `https://namma-metro-network-3su2.bolt.host`.
- Used the description: "Real-time network monitoring and passenger flow analytics for Namma Metro."

```html:src/pages/demo.astro
// ... existing code ...
            <div class="preview-card glass-dark">
              <div class="preview-chip">Live Console</div>
              <h3>Namma Metro Network</h3>
              <p>
                Real-time network monitoring and passenger flow analytics for Namma Metro.
              </p>
              <a
                href="https://namma-metro-network-3su2.bolt.host"
                target="_blank"
                rel="noopener noreferrer"
                class="preview-link"
              >
                Open Console
              </a>
